sim

Class SimulationParam

  • java.lang.Object
    • sim.SimulationParam

  • public class SimulationParam
extends Object
    An SimulationParam holds all the parameters necessary for spawning a simulator.
    Author:
    Kyle

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      HashMap<String,Float> accounts
      The account IDs and corresponding inital balances.
      boolean backward
      Whether this simulator is to be used for backward testing.
      Calendar endDate
      End date (in the case of backtesting).
      ArrayList<String> fields
      The fields for which you want records to be provided (in the case of backtesting).
      Long period
      The time, in milliseconds, between each generated record (in the case of backtesting).
      String simID
      The unique ID of this Simulation under which it will register with the MessagingService.
      boolean simStream
      Whether this simulator will use SimStreamer to generate fake records (in the case of backtesting).
      Calendar startDate
      Start date (in the case of backtesting).
      ArrayList<String> symbols
      The symbols for which you want records to be provided (in the case of backtesting).

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimulationParam()
      Constructs an empty SimulationParam object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Return whether the parameters are acceptable to make a complete simulation request.

    • Field Detail

      • accounts

        public HashMap<String,Float> accounts
        The account IDs and corresponding inital balances.

      • backward

        public boolean backward
        Whether this simulator is to be used for backward testing.

        If false, it is for forward testing. Default: false

      • startDate

        public Calendar startDate
        Start date (in the case of backtesting).

        Default: October 19, 2011

      • endDate

        public Calendar endDate
        End date (in the case of backtesting).

        Default: December 20, 2011

      • symbols

        public ArrayList<String> symbols
        The symbols for which you want records to be provided (in the case of backtesting).

      • fields

        public ArrayList<String> fields
        The fields for which you want records to be provided (in the case of backtesting).

      • period

        public Long period
        The time, in milliseconds, between each generated record (in the case of backtesting).

        Default: 86400000 (one day)

      • simStream

        public boolean simStream
        Whether this simulator will use SimStreamer to generate fake records (in the case of backtesting).

        Default: false

      • simID

        public String simID
        The unique ID of this Simulation under which it will register with the MessagingService.

        While be overwritten by the ApiSession upon simulation creation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimulationParam

        public SimulationParam()
        Constructs an empty SimulationParam object.

    • Method Detail

      • ok

        public boolean ok()
        Return whether the parameters are acceptable to make a complete simulation request.
        Returns:
        true if, and only if, the parameters are acceptable to make a complete simulation request

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
